Item.Name: Adventure Point Gift Shop
Item.Summary: At the centre of the park you will discover the Chessington Shop with an exciting array of souvenirs, treats and gifts. For refreshments and supplies, the Chessington Shop is your port of call between each new adventure.
Item.Keywords: Gift Shop, Toys, Drinks, Souvenirs

Item.Name: Adventure Point Hot Dogs
Item.Summary: Join us at  Adventure Point and create your own hot dog with a selection of toppings to choose from. Vegetarian options available.
Item.Keywords: Hot Dogs, Food, Nachos, Drinks, Vegetarian, Lunch

Item.Name: Adventure Point Pizza Pasta
Item.Summary: Adventure Point Pizza Pasta boasts a great range of pizzas, pastas and freshly prepared salads. Gluten Free Pizza's available, please ask one of our experienced hosts for more information.
Item.Keywords: Pizza. Pasta, Salad, Buffet, Vegetarian, Gluten Free, Food, Lunch, microwave

Item.Name: Adventure Tree Carousel
Item.Summary: The Chessington Adventure Tree Carousel sits at the heart of the Park in Adventure Point. A ride for one and all to enjoy! Children under 1.3m must be accompanied by an adult 16+.
Item.Keywords: Carousel, Roundabout, Horses, Merry-Go-Round
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.3 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: AMAZU Treetop Adventure
Item.Summary: AMAZU Treetop Adventure is where young adventurers can play amongst real life monkeys and other amazing animals as you follow the adventure trail through the heights of AMAZU!
Item.Keywords: Playground, Adventure Playground, Park, Jungle Gym, Playing Area

Item.Name: Amur Tigers
Item.Summary: Explore Land of the Tiger and admire the world's most majestic animals.
Item.Keywords: amur tiger, tiger, land of the tiger

Item.Name: Ankole Cattle
Item.Summary: Head over to Wanyama Village & Reserve to see our Ankole Cattle.
Item.Keywords: ankole, wanyama

Item.Name: Azteca Resort Hotel
Item.Summary: Whether you want to go on a quest to find some treasure in our Azteca Hotel, travel into an African Savannah in our Safari Hotel, our Resort hotels have a range of standard and themed rooms.
Item.Keywords: hotel, accommodation, restaurant, bar, rooms, themed rooms, zufari bar and grill, temple bar

Item.Name: Blesbok
Item.Summary: Head down to Wanyama Village & Reserve and see our baby Blesbok.
Item.Keywords: blesbok, baby, wanyama

Item.Name: Bolivian Squirrel Monkey
Item.Summary: Their species is widespread and adaptable to habitat change. They can be found in Bolivia, Brazil and Peru.

Item.Name: Bush Dog
Item.Summary:
Our Bush Dog can be found in Trail of the Kings at Chessington World of Adventures.

See Bandit, the bush dog, settling into his new home in Trail of the Kings at Chessington World of Adventures Resort. He may be small but he is mighty!

Item.Name: Canopy Capers
Item.Summary: This is a sky-high adventure for all the family, as you make your way along bouncing rope walkways, explore the fantasy tree house and see who’s first to make it to the other side.
Item.Keywords: Jungle Gym, Playground, Park, Playing Area
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Capybara
Item.Summary: The Capybara, native to South America, is the largest rodent in the world, growing to over a metre in length.

Item.Name: Chessington Explorer Glamping
Item.Summary: Glamping means glamorous camping; it combines all the adventure of camping but with all the comfort of a hotel stay. Chessington Resort’s Explorer Glamping turns a family sleepover into an exciting, outdoor experience.
Item.Keywords: glamping, accomodation, stay over, camping

Item.Name: Children's Zoo
Item.Summary: The Children's Zoo is the perfect opportunity for animal lovers to interact with a range of farmyard friends, including pygmy goats, chickens, KuneKune pigs and sheep.

Item.Name: Chiloe Wigeon Ducks
Item.Summary: Named after the island of Chiloé off the Chilean coast, this duck has an iridescent blue-green cap on its head and white forehead and cheeks. Its natural habitats are lakes, marshes, lagoons and rivers and it is known to be a highly vocal bird.
Item.Keywords: ducks, chiloe, birds

Item.Name: Common Eland
Item.Summary: Head over to Wanyama Village & Reserve to admire our Eland.
Item.Keywords: eland, wanyama

Item.Name: Dirty Fries
Item.Summary: MAY BE CLOSED ON YOUR DAY OF VISIT. Try our extra dirty Halloumi Fries. Vegetarian options available.
Item.Keywords: Vegetarian, Halloumi Fries, Chips, Snack, Food, Lunch

Item.Name: Donut Express
Item.Summary: MAY BE CLOSED ON YOUR DAY OF VISIT. Freshly prepared in front of your eyes available in a range of flavours. Plus, soft serve Ice Cream and Hot Drinks including Costa Coffee.
Item.Keywords: Coffee, Doughnuts, Adventure Point, Costa, Ice Cream, Food, Snack, Lunch

Item.Name: Dorcas Gazelle
Item.Summary: Native to the deserts of North Africa and the Middle East, these slender animals can survive without drinking, getting all the liquid they need from their diet of plants. They are incredibly fast and can run at almost 80kph.

Item.Name: Dragon's Fury
Item.Summary: Ride through dizzying twists and turns, dips and dives. Must be 1.2m. Face Mask Mandatory.
Item.Keywords: Fury, Dragon, Spinning Coaster, Red, Thrill, Dragon Ride
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is greater than 1.95 m, then you cannot ride. If your chest is greater than 51 cm, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.2 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: Elmer's Flying Jumbos
Item.Summary: Pick a colourful elephant to take them to the skies on the flying carousel surrounded by jungle. Children under 1.1m must be accompanied by an adult 16+
Item.Keywords: Elephants, Dumbo, Flying Dumbos, Kids Ride, Elmer
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Explorer Supplies
Item.Summary: Be prepared for your Wild Adventure and grab some supplies or a souvenir of your visit at Explorer's Supplies.
Item.Keywords: shop

Item.Name: Geoffroy's Marmoset
Item.Summary: Our Geoffroy's Marmoset can be found in our Monkey walk-through in Amazu.
Item.Keywords: monkey, monkey walk through

Item.Name: Go Ape
Item.Summary:
Swing through the trees at one of our two Go Ape courses! Plus, anyone over 1m can enjoy taking park, meaning the whole family can Go Ape together!

Please note, Go Ape courses are subject to an additional charge.
Item.Keywords: Swing, Outdoor Adventure, Swinging, Zip Wire, Tree Top Adventure, Tree Top Challenge, High Ropes, Climbing
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your weight is greater than 130 kg, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: Golden-Headed Tamarins
Item.Summary: Golden-Headed Lion Tamarins inhabit forest fragments in Brazil. They like to eat fruit, nectar, flowers, insects and reptiles. In the wild they like to sleep in hollow trees with very small entrance holes so they are out of reach of predators.
Item.Keywords: tamarins, golden headed, amazu

Item.Name: Western Lowland Gorillas
Item.Summary: Very endangered in its forest habitat in Central Africa, gorillas are the largest apes and live in groups dominated by a silverback - a mature alpha male with silver-grey hair on its back.

Item.Name: Greater Flamingo
Item.Summary: Flamingos live in colonies often with thousands of breeding pairs, yet mothers can identify their own chick by its call.

Item.Name: Grevy’s Zebra
Item.Summary: This endangered species, now found only in Kenya and Ethiopia, is the largest of all the zebras and like its cousins, the exact pattern of stripes is unique to each animal.

Item.Name: Griffin's Galleon
Item.Summary: Join the fun-loving crew on board Griffin’s Galleon and ride the waves back and forth with an unexpected turn at each end. Must be 0.9m. Children under 1.2m must be accompanied by an adult 16+
Item.Keywords: Pirates, Land of the Dragons, Pirate Ship, Boat Ride, Ship Ride
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.2 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Humboldt Penguins
Item.Summary: Our Humboldt Penguins can be found in Penguin Bay.
Item.Keywords: penguins, penguin bay

Item.Name: Jungle Bus
Item.Summary: Are you ready for a bus trip with a difference? Take your seat and you’ll swing up into the air for a top-deck view over Wild Asia. Must be 0.9m. Children under 1.1m must be accompanied by an adult 16+.
Item.Keywords: Bus, Bus Ride, Swinging Bus, Jungle Ride, Wild Asia
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is greater than 1.95 m, then you cannot ride. If your chest is greater than 51 cm, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Jungle Rangers
Item.Summary: Families will start their journey into the Rainforest by taking the wheel on Jungle Rangers, a car ride where the kids are in control. Children under 1.2m must be accompanied by an adult 16+.
Item.Keywords: The Rainforest, Jungle Rangers, New for 2020
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.2 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Just Chicken
Item.Summary: Enjoy 100% chicken pieces or southern fried burgers and wraps, freshly hand breaded and prepared daily. Venture into the courtyard for additional seating.
Item.Keywords: Chicken, Fresh, Meal Deals, take away, eat in, food, Forbidden Kingdom, Lunch, Food, snack

Item.Name: Kirk’s Dik-Dik
Item.Summary: These shy animals are small antelopes weighing around 7 kg when fully grown. Originating in Eastern and South-Western Africa, they mate for life and get their name from the distinctive ‘dik-dik’ alarm call they make when they are threatened.

Item.Name: KOBRA
Item.Summary: Face Mask Mandatory. Spinning through the air as you travel backwards and forwards on a 90 metre track at an awesome 43mph. Must be 1.2m.
Item.Keywords: Snake Ride, Spinning Snake, KOBRA, Snake, Family Thrill, Wild Asia
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your chest is greater than 51 cm, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.2 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: Asiatic Lions
Item.Summary: Smaller than its African cousin, the Asiatic Lion was almost hunted to extinction but now some 350 live in India’s Gir Forest National Park. Males are much bigger than females and have a distinctive big mane and a roar that can carry for five miles.

Item.Name: Meerkats
Item.Summary: Nothing to do with a ‘cat’, this appealing animal is in fact a mongoose. They live in underground burrows in large groups and when out hunting several animals will stand on their hind legs looking out for predators and giving a warning signal.

Item.Name: Military Macaw
Item.Summary: Look out for our Military Macaw in Amazu.
Item.Keywords: macaw, parrot, birds

Item.Name: Monkey Swinger
Item.Summary: Whatever your age, bring out your inner cheeky little monkey on this fun ride that will have you swinging through the air, soaring round and round, getting higher and higher. Choose your seat carefully… you could get very wet. Must be 1.2m.
Item.Keywords: Swinging Ride, Swinging Carousel, Twirling Ride, Monkey Swing, Chair O Plane, Seated Swing
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.2 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: Monkey Walkthrough
Item.Summary: Come to our Monkey Walkthrough, where you can see a variety of different animals up close.

Item.Name: Nitrogenie
Item.Summary: Enjoy the World's Best ice cream, Nitrogenie! Watch the magic of liquid Nitrogen as it creates your super smooth treat. Which flavour will you go for?
Item.Keywords: Ice Cream, Nitrogenie, Snack, food,

Item.Name: Ostrich
Item.Summary: The largest of all the birds (and laying the biggest eggs), the flightless ostrich relies on its running speed of up to 70kph to escape danger.

Item.Name: Asian Short-Clawed Otter
Item.Summary: Vulnerable in their natural habitat, these are the smallest species of otter in the world and are perfectly at home on land or in water. They live in extended family groups and younger family members help to raise their little brothers and sisters.

Item.Name: Penguin Bay
Item.Summary: Get up close to our Humboldt penguins in their South American Bahía Pingüino (Penguin Bay).

Item.Name: Africa Photo Collection Point
Item.Summary: Head over to Africa to our Photo Collection point to collect your pictures.
Item.Keywords: photo, collection, digital photos

Item.Name: Rainbow Lorikeet
Item.Summary: Go truly wild on an expedition through the Lorikeet Lagoon, part of Wild Asia... a beautiful way to meet these exotic and colourful birds. Plus, look out for our Chiloe Wigeon Ducks.

Item.Name: Rattlesnake
Item.Summary: This is a right rattling rollercoaster ride and you’ll be in hiss-sterics as you snake your way through the sharp turns, inclines and sudden dips of the old Mexican tin mine. Must be 1.4m.
Item.Keywords: Snake Ride, Coaster, Thrill Adventure, Thrill Coaster
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your chest is greater than 51 cm, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.4 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is greater than 1.95 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: Red Headed Tamarins
Item.Summary: Look out for the cheeky Red Headed Tamarins in our Monkey walk-through in Amazu.
Item.Keywords: red handed tamarins, monkey

Item.Name: Reindeer
Item.Summary: Known as Caribou in America, reindeers live in the cold north, including the Arctic. They have thick coats to keep them warm, flat hooves that act as snow shoes and both males and females re-grow their amazing long antlers every year.

Item.Name: River Rafts
Item.Summary: Make a splash on mini-log flume, River Rafts – watch out though for the cheeky chimps that live along the waterway! Children under 1.2m must be accompanied by an adult 16+.
Item.Keywords: The Rainforest, New for 2020, River Rafts, River Ride, Water Ride
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.2 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult. If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: Room on the Broom - A Magical Journey
Item.Summary: Face Mask Mandatory. Visit the enchanted library and walk-through the pages of the book written by Julia Donaldson and illustrated by Axel Scheffler and experience the much-loved children’s story come to life! May not be suitable for under 4's.
Item.Keywords: Room on the Broom, Witch, Walk Through, Childrens Story, Magical, Julia Donaldson, Axel Scheffler
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Room on the Broom - Animated Movie Experience
Item.Summary:
Fly through the film in the brand new Room on the Broom – Animated Movie Experience also at Chessington from only £15. 

Board Witch’s broomstick and star in your own magical journey alongside your co-stars, all the Room on the Broom characters.
Item.Keywords: animated movie experience, room on the broom, new

Item.Name: Rothschild Giraffe
Item.Summary: Head over to our Wanyama Village & Reserve to admire our beautiful Rothschild Giraffe.
Item.Keywords: giraffe, rothschild

Item.Name: Safari Resort Hotel
Item.Summary: Whether you want to go on a quest to find some treasure in our Azteca Hotel, travel into an African Savannah in our Safari Hotel, our Resort hotels have a range of standard and themed rooms.
Item.Keywords: hotel, safari, accommodation, restaurant, leisure centre, gym, swimming pool, bar, drinks, arcade, gift shop, conference centre, check in

Item.Name: Saki Monkey
Item.Summary: Our super cheeky Saki Monkey's can be found in Amazu.
Item.Keywords: Amazu, saki money, monkey walk through

Item.Name: Scimitar Horned Oryx
Item.Summary: Our sweet Scimitar Horned Oryx can be found in Wanyama Village & Reserve.
Item.Keywords: wanyama, oryx

Item.Name: Scorpion Express
Item.Summary: Face Mask Mandatory. The Scorpion Express rollercoaster is a fun ride for all the family and brave young adventurers can experience their first rollercoaster thrill. Children between 0.9m - 1.1m must be accompanied by an adult 16+
Item.Keywords: Little Coaster, Small Coaster, Family Ride, Scorpion, Express, Young Thrill
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is greater than 0.51 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is greater than 1.95 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Sea Dragons
Item.Summary: We’ve tamed these friendly Sea Dragons so that little adventurers can hop on board a boat and enjoy a gentle ride on the high seas. Children between 0.9m - 1.1m must be accompanied by an adult 16+.
Item.Keywords: Boat Ride, Sail Ride, Small Boats, Family Ride, Carousel, Water Ride
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult. If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: SEA LIFE Centre
Item.Summary: Our SEA LIFE centre is packed full of fun exhibitions, including interactive rock pools, daily talks and feeding sessions as well as a breathtaking walk-through ocean tunnel.

Item.Name: SEA LIFE Shop
Item.Summary: Once you have explored Chessington’s amazing SEA LIFE centre be sure to visit the SEA LIFE shop for some more underwater fun.
Item.Keywords: Shop, Souvenirs, Toys

Item.Name: Sea Lion Bay
Item.Summary: Splash down to Sea Lion Bay for the chance to see our Sea Lions play in the water!
Item.Keywords: SEA LION, Encounter, Feed, sea lion bay

Item.Name: Seastorm
Item.Summary: All aboard Seastorm as you ride, twist and turn over the ‘waves’ in your miniature pirate galleon. Children between 0.9m - 1.1m must be accompanied by an adult 16+.
Item.Keywords: Seastorm, family ride, pirates cove, boat ride
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Sitatungas
Item.Summary: Look out for our Sitatungas in Wanyama Village & Reserve.
Item.Keywords: sitatunga, wanyama village

Item.Name: Smokehouse BBQ & Bar
Item.Summary: MAY BE CLOSED ON YOUR DAY OF VISIT. Featuring low & slow roasted pulled pork, beef brisket, pork ribs and chicken, all cooked in a wood barbecue pit and smoked to perfection.
Item.Keywords: BBQ, Smokehouse, Food, Meat, snack, lunch, dine in, sit down

Item.Name: SOKO Shop
Item.Summary: If you're in our hotels pop over to the SOKO shop to pick up a souvenir of your time at Chessington.
Item.Keywords: soko shop, hotel, safari hotel

Item.Name: Southern Ground Hornbill
Item.Summary: Southern Ground Hornbill can be found in Wanyama Village & Reserve. Look out for their wonderfully coloured faces.
Item.Keywords: hornbill, wanyama

Item.Name: Southern White Rhino
Item.Summary: Head over to Wanyama Village & Reserve to see our Southern White Rhino.
Item.Keywords: rhino, wanyama

Item.Name: Spider Monkey
Item.Summary: Spider Monkey can be found in Ecuador. Their diet consists of 90% fruit and 10% nuts and seeds. They are very chatty and like to live in big groups of up to 35 monkeys but split up during the day to find food.

Item.Name: Bolivian Squirrel Monkeys
Item.Summary: This species is widespread and adaptable to habitat change. They can be found in Bolivia, Brazil and Peru. They have 26 different calls; chirps and peeps when they are shocked, squawks and purrs when they want to breed, barks when they are fighting and screams when they are hurt.
Item.Keywords: monkey, squirrel monkey

Item.Name: Sweet Shop
Item.Summary: More sweets then you could ever imagine all under one roof! Create your own Pick & Mix selection from the huge variety at Chessington’s very own Sweet Shop. Choose from candy floss, ice cream, bubble gum, popcorn and many more sweets and treats!
Item.Keywords: Sweets, Pick and Mix, Treats, Ice Cream, Drinks

Item.Name: Temple Restaurant & Bar
Item.Summary: A unique and interactive dining experience set in the heart of a mystical ancient temple, where a fountain that was once the life force of the jungle is protected by the wildlife that call it home. All guests are welcome.
Item.Keywords: Hotel, Lunch, Dining, food, lunch, dinner, snack, sit down, eat in, microwave

Item.Name: The Coffee Hut
Item.Summary: MAY BE CLOSED ON YOUR DAY OF VISIT. Sip our delicious Rainforest Alliance coffee and not treat yourself from a selection of scrumptious cakes, muffins and freshly handmade sandwiches.
Item.Keywords: Coffee, Snacks, Drink, snack, food

Item.Name: The Gruffalo Gift Shop
Item.Summary: Once you've taken a riverboat journey through the deep dark wood or swooped through the trees on Vampire, take a look in The Gruffalo Gift Shop for some exclusive goodies.
Item.Keywords: Shop, Souvenirs, Toys

Item.Name: The Gruffalo River Ride Adventure
Item.Summary: Face Mask Mandatory. Join your favourite Gruffalo character Mouse on a magical riverboat and journey through the deep dark wood. Children under 1.1m must be accompanied by an adult 16+.
Item.Keywords: Water Ride, Boat Ride, Wet Ride, Family Ride, Gruffalo, River Ride
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: The MANE Stage
Item.Summary: The MANE Stage  is currently not holding any daily shows until further notice!
Item.Keywords: MANE Stage, gruffalo arena, gruffalo

Item.Name: Three Banded Armadillo
Item.Summary: They are found in south west Brazil and Bolivia. They mainly eat ants and other bugs such as termites, which they can smell through up to eight inches of soil. Armadillos are famous for their defensive, armoured shells. The three-banded armadillo can roll itself completely into a ball.
Item.Keywords: armadillo, amazu, childrens zoo

Item.Name: Tiger Rock
Item.Summary: Embark on a river journey through uncharted territory and get to see one of the world’s most majestic animals from the waterway. Children between 1.2m - 1.3m must be accompanied by an adult 16+.
Item.Keywords: Tiger, Boat Ride, Water Ride, Log Flume
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.2 m, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: Tiger Treats
Item.Summary: MAY BE CLOSED ON YOUR DAY OF VISIT. In the heart of Land of the Tiger, stumble across Tiger Treats with Amur-zing churros, donuts and drinks.
Item.Keywords: Snacks, Treats, Doughnuts, Churros, Ice Cream, Drinks

Item.Name: Tiny Truckers
Item.Summary: We’ve scaled down our kings of the road so that even little adventurers can get behind the wheel in this colourful convoy of trucks. Children under 1.1m must be accompanied by an adult 16+.
Item.Keywords: Car Ride, Driving Cars, Tiny Trucks, Driving School
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your chest is greater than 51 cm, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Tomb Blaster
Item.Summary: Ride through the Ancient Egyptian labyrinth armed with a laser gun to shoot mummies and scarab beetles and rid the tomb of its evil curse. Children under 1.1m must be accompanied by an adult 16+.
Item.Keywords: Indoor Ride, Tomb Plaster, Laser Quest, Mummy ride, Ancient, Tomb, Blaster, High Score
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Treetop Hoppers
Item.Summary: Climb above the canopy on Treetop Hoppers to get a glimpse of the wildlife that lives high above the jungle. Children between 0.9m - 1.1m must be accompanied by an adult 16+.
Item.Keywords: Treetop Hopper, Mini Drop Ride, Kids Ride
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult. If your chest is less than 51 cm, then you cannot ride.

Item.Name: Tuk Tuk Treats
Item.Summary: MAY BE CLOSED ON YOUR DAY OF VISIT. What better way to cool down in a lost land than with a delicious ice cream and chilled drink?
Item.Keywords: Ice cream, drinks, tuk tuk treats

Item.Name: Tuk Tuk Turmoil
Item.Summary: Face Mask Mandatory. Tuk tuks are the nippy little auto-rickshaws that cram the streets of Bangkok and this is Chessington’s version. Children between 0.9m - 1.3m must be accompanied by an adult 16+.
Item.Keywords: Bumper Cars, Car Ride, Dodgem
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is less than 0.9 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.3 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Vampire
Item.Summary: Face masks are mandatory. Just like a bat out of hell, this family-friendly rollercoaster gets you soaring through the skies and flying over the treetops with your legs dangling below you. Must be 1.1m. Children under 1.3m must be accompanied by an adult 16+.
Item.Keywords: Vampire, Roller Coaster, Purple, The Vampire, Bat Ride
Item.RestrictionSummary: If your height is greater than 1.95 m, then you cannot ride. If your chest is greater than 51 cm, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.1 m, then you cannot ride. If your height is less than 1.3 m, then you must be accompanied by an adult.

Item.Name: Vampire Burger Kitchen
Item.Summary: MAY BE CLOSED ON YOUR DAY OF VISIT. Sink your teeth into our succulent burgers, made with 100% beef & chicken breast.
Item.Keywords: Burger, Meal Deals, Food, Fresh Food, lunch, snack, sit down, eat in, chicken

Item.Name: Zafari Bar & Grill
Item.Summary: Our African themed restaurant at the Chessington Safari Hotel. Choose from a range of international specialities fresh from the grill.
Item.Keywords: Bar and Grill, hotel, dinner, lunch, microwave

Item.Name: ZUFARI: Ride into Africa!
Item.Summary: ZUFARI – Ride into Africa! Is a theme park adventure and safari combined. Come face to face with wonderful African animals as you embark on a thrilling off-road truck journey… Must be 1m. Children under 1.3m must be accompanied by an adult 16+.
Item.Keywords: Safari ride, Animal Safari, Zoo ride, Off Road ride

Feature.Title: Get your 2nd Day FREE on Short Breaks
Feature.Summary: Turn your WILD day into a ROARSOME overnight stay in our Resort Hotels!

Feature.Title: Face Masks
Feature.Summary: Face Masks/Coverings are mandatory on selected rides & from Friday 24th July, gift shops and SEA LIFE!

Feature.Title: Pre-Order from Vampire Burger Kitchen
Feature.Summary: Pre-order skip the queues and sink your teeth into our delicious burgers! Menu subject to availability.

Offer.Title: Free Meal Upgrade @ Fried Chicken Co
Offer.Description: Visit the fried chicken Co restaurant next to Rameses revenge between 2pm and 4pm and receive a free upgrade to a large adult meal for every regular adult meal purchased.

Offer.Title: The Captain's Fish & Chips Deal
Offer.Description: Visit the Captain’s fish and chip restaurant next to the black buccaneer between 2pm and 4pm and receive the Captains deal – 2 Adults meals, 2 Kids meals and 2 sides (Mushy peas, gravy, Curry sauce) all for £25!

Offer.Title: Free Sauce With Every 10 Donuts Purchased
Offer.Description: Visit Market donuts or the donut shack and receive a free sauce with every 10 donuts purchased.

Offer.Title: Free Large Meal Upgrade at Vampire Burger Kitchen
Offer.Description: Visit the Vampire Burger Kitchen restaurant in Transylvania between 2pm and 4pm and receive a free upgrade to a large adult meal for every regular adult meal purchased.

Offer.Title: Large hot drink for the price of a regular
Offer.Description:
Purchase any large hot drink and pay the price of a regular size drink. Offer available at Asian Ices, Donut Shack and Market Square Donuts.

Terms and conditions: Annual pass discount not applicable, not to be used in conjunction with any other offer.

Offer.Title: Bounce back tomorrow for £1
Offer.Description: Congratulations for downloading the Chessington Mobile App and unlocking your exclusive £1 bounce back ticket for tomorrow. To redeem this offer show your original park ticket along with the app on your phone at our Lodge Gate or Explorer Gate.

Offer.Title: Takeaway Pizza
Offer.Description: Visit Pizza Pasta after 3pm and get two takeaway pizzas for only £12.95.

Offer.Title: Free cheese or chilli on hot dog purchases
Offer.Description: Visit Market Square Hot Dogs between 2pm and 4pm and receive either free cheese or chilli on every hot dog purchased with a meal.

Offer.Title: Free Muffin with every hot drink purchase
Offer.Description: Visit the Original Sandwich Co. or the Coffee Hut and receive a free muffin with every hot drink purchased.

Offer.Title: Bacon roll and drink for £3.50

Annual Pass discount is not valid on this offer. Offer only redeemable between 20th October 2017 and 31st October 2017.

Offer.Title: Experience Creepy Caves Unearthed!

£6 per person. 
£4.80 per person for Merlin Annual Passholders.

Offer.Title: Tickets from £29.50

Offer.Description:
You can save up to 38% on Chessington tickets when you book online and in advance. Pre-booking is strongly advised to guarantee entry as we have limited capacity following our re-opening.

- Book Online, 5 or more days in advance
- All Tickets include Theme Park, Zoo and SEA LIFE centre
- Over 40 rides and attractions
- All online tickets covered by our Rainy Day Guarantee

Offer.Title: Local Annual Pass - SALE NOW ON!
Offer.Summary: Upgrade today and get your entry fee refunded! Local Annual Passes from £39. Visit the hub in Mexicana to find out more.
Offer.Description:
Upgrade today and get your entry fee refunded!* Local Annual Passes from £39. Visit the hub in Mexicana to find out more.

Standard Pass

RRP normally £65 reduced to £50 Standard Park benefits include: £10 Entry during August exclusion dates, Bring a Friend for £10, Explorer Exclusive discounts, Go Ape discount - 15% off, VIP discount - 20% off all animal experiences, Merlin Holiday Club. Exclusions: Fridays, Saturdays & Sundays in August, 1st Sept, & Winters Tail 2019.

Off Peak Pass

RRP normally £50 reduced to £39. Off Peak Pass benefits include: FREE PARKING, Coffee & Cake for £3 in OSC & Coffee Hut, Go Ape discount - 15% off, VIP discount - 20% off all animal experiences, Merlin Holiday Club. Entry: ONLY on off peak weekdays AND Zoo only weekends. Exclusions: Weekends, Summer Holidays, Winters Tail.

*Refunds only available up to the value of your annual pass. Terms & conditions apply.

Offer.Title: Annual Pass Sale
Offer.Summary: Buy your Chessington Annual Pass from ONLY £55 and enjoy a ROARSOME year of family fun and WILD adventures! Sale ends 20th April
Offer.Description:
Enjoy a ROARSOME year at Britain's Wildest Adventure! Includes our INTRODUCTORY OFFER on our NEW Premium Chessington Annual Pass for just £75.

Enjoy loads of extra perks, including 15% off Go Ape Chessington, 20% off VIP Animal Experiences, Short Breaks offers & discounts and LOADS MORE...

Merlin Entertainments Limited, and the wider Merlin Entertainments Group, would like to use your personal data (including your contact information, postcode, device data, and purchase data) to keep in touch with personalised email and SMS updates about our magical attractions, hotels and the amazing offers we have available. To see a list of the attractions we will be telling you about and a note of the companies in the Merlin Entertainments Group, please click on the link directly below.

For more information about how we manage your personal data, please read our Privacy Policy at the link directly below. To change your preferences or to stop receiving direct marketing emails from us, you just need to click the link at the bottom of our emails.
